Package stars

Class DisplayDataController

java.lang.Object
stars.DisplayDataController
public class DisplayDataController
extends java.lang.Object
Controller class to display stored information for various entities and return a valid choice from user

    • courseSelection

      public Course courseSelection​(School sch)
      Retrieve list of courses from selected school and display for user to see and select. Allows user to choose sorting method to sort by either number of reviews or by percentage recommended.
      Parameters:
      sch - School user wants to select course from
      Returns:
      Course Course user selected

    • indexSelection

      public Index indexSelection​(Course course)
      Retrieve list of indexes from selected course and display for user to see and select.
      Parameters:
      course - Course user wants to select index from
      Returns:
      Index Index selected by user

    • selectRegisteredCourses

      Parameters:
      s - student who is making the selection
      Returns:
      registered course object selected
